author: "Lord, Henry, fl. 1624-1630"
title: "A display of two forraigne sects in the East Indies, viz. the sect of the Banians, the ancient natiues of India, and the sect of the Persees, the ancient inhabitants of Persia, together with the religion and maners of each sect / Collected into two bookes"
imprint: "London : T. & R. Cotes Imprinted for Francis Constable, 1630"
